name: @wpmudev/shared-ui
description: For internal use in WPMU DEV plugins
author: WPMU DEV

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && gulp update-versions:build && git add -A && git commit -m ":package:" && gulp tag && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && gulp update-versions:build && git add -A && git commit -m ":package:" && gulp tag && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && gulp update-versions:build && git add -A && git commit -m ":package:" && gulp tag && npm publish
